sentences.en: As the president's prestige continues to fall, they're clearly beginning to consider him a liability.
sentences.cn: 随着总统的声望持续下跌，他们显然开始视他为负累。

sentences.en: Doctors have suffered a loss of prestige following a spate of scandals.
sentences.cn: 接二连三的丑闻使医生名誉扫地.

sentences.en: Does she have enough prestige to win the nomination?
sentences.cn: 她有足够的威望赢得提名 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dr. Boris Sidis was a Russian-born psychiatrist who enjoyed considerable prestige; some placed him on a par with Pierre Janet and Morton Prince.
sentences.cn: 鲍里斯·西季斯医生是一位出生于俄国、素负盛名的精神病学家，有些人认为他堪与皮埃尔·雅内和莫顿·普林斯比肩。

sentences.en: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.cn: 他是一位有声望的科学家.

sentences.en: He used to angle for prestige.
His prestige , high before , went higher still.
sentences.cn: 他原来已有很高的声望, 现在就更高了.

sentences.en: His rule, his safety, depended upon prestige.
sentences.cn: 他的统治 、 他的安全, 是依靠威望来维持的.

sentences.en: In five years it would do away with divorce and re - establish the prestige of the home.
sentences.cn: 五年之内,管保可以根除离婚的现象,重建家庭的尊严.

sentences.en: Is, as Mr. Nixon said, our prestige at an all time high?
sentences.cn: 是否如尼克松先生所说, 我们的声望正前所未有的高?

sentences.en: The contract will affect our national prestige in the world.
sentences.cn: 这一合同将会影响我国的国际声望.

sentences.en: The king wanted to enhance his prestige through war.
sentences.cn: 国王想通过战争来提高自己的威信。

sentences.en: the personal prestige attached to owning a large property
sentences.cn: 拥有大房子所带来的体面

sentences.en: Their products enjoy ever higher prestige in the world market.
sentences.cn: 他们的产品在世界市场上享有越来越高的声誉.

sentences.en: There is a lot of prestige attached to owning a car like this.
sentences.cn: 拥有这样一部汽车会显得很气派。

sentences.en: This little-known British firm has now gained considerable prestige .
sentences.cn: 这家名不见经传的英国公司如今已经声名鹊起。

sentences.en: This retiring attitude enchanced his prestige.
sentences.cn: 他这种与世无争的态度更增加了他的威望.

trans.tran_cn: 令人敬仰的；受尊重的；重要的,名贵的；贵重的；讲究派头的
威信，威望，声望，声誉，（财势的）显赫，信望
trans.tran_en: the respect and admiration that someone or something gets because of their success or important position in society
